sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_176383_star_wars_gear"> <x_176383_star_wars_gear action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <base_damage>0</base_damage> <critical_rating/> <defense/> <description>Usually reserved for formal affairs or the dealings of the wealthy, these small, disk-like devices create holographic recordings or transmissions that may be played back as a small projection. The user can easily hold a holo-messenger in one hand. Though uncommon, they have played an integral part in many revenge or entrapment schemes.</description> <encumbrance>0</encumbrance> <hard_points>0</hard_points> <hp_required/> <name>Holo-Messenger</name> <number>GEAR0001047</number> <price>250</price> <range/> <rarity>4</rarity> <skill_used/> <soak/> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2020-11-02 18:57:17</sys_created_on> <sys_id>8f9cd3642fd0a450e0f497eef699b6af</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2020-11-02 18:57:17</sys_updated_on> <type>gear</type> </x_176383_star_wars_gear> </record_update>
